group_1.textLeft: Okay!@First, we start with the onions!

group_1.textRight: But I thought you were going to make@pumpkin soup?

group_1.textLeft: I am!@Of course, the main ingredient is pumpkin!
But when you caramelize the onions...
...it really adds a richness to the dish!
Ummm...how can I explain...
The flavor...@It gets...deeper!
But anyway...
Is it fun to watch me even though you@don't seem to get the nuances of flavor?

group_1.textRight: It does not matter if me observing you@is fun or not.
The reason it's important for me to@watch you...
Is due to your potential as a Magical Girl.
Naturally, I cannot watch you all@day and night...
But I like to monitor you when I get@the opportunity.

group_1.textLeft: Hmph...@you don't give up, do you?

group_1.narration: This is my home.@The restaurant, Walnut's!
Ever since I was a little girl,@I spent hours in this place...@There's so many memories here...@I grew up watching my father cook,@all while improving my own cooking skills.
My father is the owner and head chef of@the restaurant.@He's spent countless hours preparing@delicious food to delight the pallets of@well-known "celebrities".
And, so that I can follow in the footsteps of@my awesome father...@I work day and night to train to become@a world-class chef in my own right.

group_1.textLeft: Now slice gently down the center and...
Voil√†!
Walnut's special [chara:300902:motion_100]fluffy rice omelet!
...Well...
I thought I'd get in a little extra training@while I waited for customers to come...

group_1.textRight: And on top of that, a rice omelet.

group_1.textLeft: But it looks like I've gone ahead...
...and made enough food for a small party.

group_1.narration: Our restaurant, Walnut's...@Was once a popular place@to eat among celebrities...
But at some point, I don't know...@Something changed.@Now, instead of attracting@celebrities, the only thing our@restaurant attracts is dust...

group_1.textRight: By the way...@Where did your father go?

group_1.textLeft: To pick up supplies for the restaurant,@of course.

group_1.textRight: Even though there are no customers?

group_1.textLeft: Hey...!@Watch it you weird little rabbit-thing!
I know that!@I was just making fun of you!

group_1.textRight: Manaka, make a contract with me and@become a Magical Girl.
If you become a Magical Girl...
You can use your wish to make this place@popular again!

group_1.textLeft: I don't need your creepy rabbit magic to@make this place a success!
My father and I...
We're already working on a new,@big opportunity!
